paragraph.heading: 1Flat Contract view
paragraph.paragraph:
The Flat Contract view
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_format_interface_color.gif displays the contracts of all written-in and inherited features of the current class. It is available either through the
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/20_editor/index.xml editor or through the Class tab of the
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/05_general_interface_description/20_eiffelstudio_window_overview.xml context tool .
paragraph.warning:
Caution: For classes with many
./30_ancestors_format.xml ancestors , computation of the Flat Contract view may require a few seconds.
